application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Enlargement of existing basement area and construction of lightwell to rear of property with new glazing to basement room elevation and alteration to external access to ground floor kitchen on rear elevation. Alterations to garden landscaping.
decision_conditions:
<p style="margin-left: 15px;">Prior to the commencement of development, details of a scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the site against surface water flood risk shall be submitted to and agreed, in writing with the Local Planning Authority in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety before the extension is occupied and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with current best practices.</p><p><br></p><p>
REASON: To mitigate any potential flooding on site</p>

<p>All new external facing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture unless otherwise shown on the hereby approved plans.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: T<span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap;">o ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the host building and Conservation Area.</span></p><p><br></p>

<p>Prior to use of the hereby approved terrace at upper ground floor details of a privacy screen along the boundary with No.27 shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The privacy screen shall be installed in accordance with the approved details and maintained in perpetuity prior to the use of the terrace.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To safeguard the amenity of the neighbouring residents.</p>

<p style="margin-left: 15px;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification of a drainage layout and an overflow where necessary of the permeable paving to the&nbsp; lightwell/terrace shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, in consultation with the LLFA, the development shall thereafter be carried out in accordance with the approved details.</p><p style="margin-left: 15px;"><br></p><p style="margin-left: 15px;">REASON: To ensure suitable drainage is provided for within the development.</p>
